sen.j: 脇坂 安実（わきさか やすざね）は、播磨国龍野藩の第6代藩主。
sen.e: Yasuzane WAKISAKA was the sixth lord of the Tatsuno domain of the Province of Harima.
Yasuzane WAKISAKA was the sixth lord of the Tatsuno Domain in Harima Province.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更、in Harima Provinceとしました。
sen.e: Yasuzane WAKISAKA was the sixth lord of the Tatsuno Domain in Harima Province.
The eighth lord of the Wakisaka family in the Tatsuno domain.
The eighth head of the Wakisaka family in the Tatsuno Domain.
sen.cmt: The eighth headとし、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: The eighth head of the Wakisaka family in the Tatsuno Domain.

sen.j: 延享2年（1745年）6月3日、第4代藩主・脇坂安興の次男として生まれる。
sen.e: Born on June 3, 1745 as the second son of Yasuoki WAKISAKA, the fourth lord of domain.
Born on July 2, 1745 as the second son of Yasuoki WAKISAKA, the fourth lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正、lord of domain→lord of the Domainとしました。
sen.e: Born on July 2, 1745 as the second son of Yasuoki WAKISAKA, the fourth lord of the Domain.

sen.j: 第5代藩主で異母兄である脇坂安弘に嗣子が無かったために養子となった。
sen.e: Since Yasuhiro WAKISAKA, the fifth lord of domain and older paternal half-brother, did not have an heir, Tasuzane was adopted by Yasuhiro.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Since Yasuhiro WAKISAKA, the fifth lord of the Domain and older paternal half-brother, did not have an heir, Yasuzane was adopted by Yasuhiro.
sen.cmt: Tasuzane→Yasuzaneに修正、lord of domain→lord of the Domainとしました。
sen.e: Since Yasuhiro WAKISAKA, the fifth lord of the Domain and older paternal half-brother, did not have an heir, Yasuzane was adopted by Yasuhiro.

sen.j: 宝暦7年（1757年）に兄が死去すると、家督を継いで第6代藩主となった。
sen.e: When his brother died in 1757, he took over as the head of the family and became the sixth lord of domain.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: When his brother died in 1757, he took over as the head of the family and became the sixth lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: lord of domain→lord of the Domainとしました。
sen.e: When his brother died in 1757, he took over as the head of the family and became the sixth lord of the Domain.

sen.j: 12月に従五位下・伊勢守に叙位・任官する。
sen.e: He was honored and appointed as Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Ise no kami (Governor of Ise Province) in December.
He was honored and appointed as Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Governor of Ise Province in January 1758.
sen.cmt: Ise no kami (Governor of Ise Province)→Governor of Ise Provinceのみとし、旧暦→新暦に修正
sen.e: He was honored and appointed as Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Governor of Ise Province in January 1758.

sen.j: 宝暦9年（1759年）7月21日に江戸で死去した。
sen.e: Died on July 21, 1759 in Edo.
He died on August 13, 1759 in Edo.
He died on August 13, 1759 in Edo.
Died at the age of 15.
Died at the age of 15.
Died at the age of 15.

sen.j: 後を養子の脇坂安親が継いだ。
sen.e: Yasuchika WAKISAKA, his adopted son, succeeded him.
Yasuchika WAKISAKA, his adopted son, succeeded him.
Yasuchika WAKISAKA, his adopted son, succeeded him.
